resources.string:
1. Make Sure you mention Valid Email Id. "
"2. Enter your Name correctly without any Spelling mistakes."
"3. Check the box below before Start Exam."
"4. Each Question carriers 3 marks if correctly answered, -2 marks for wrong answer."
" 4. To save Answer you need to Click Submit button for each and every Answer."
"5. Cannot Change answer Once Submitted.
1. Who is the present CEO of Google ?
2. Which country allows women to start business without male permission?
